articles.title: Ukraine updates: Dam collapse a Russian 'inside job' - DW (English)
articles.description: The New York Times reported there was evidence Russia was responsible for blowing up the dam. Meanwhile, Kyiv thanked allies for disaster aid, following the floods caused by the dam collapse. DW has the latest.
